CustomField.description: This field will have to concatenate all the information that is checked on the OP4I Pricebook Names fields along with Tier and Pricebook
CustomField.formula:
IF(Repstor__c == true,Price_book_Code__c & ' ' & 'Repstor' & ' ' & Tier_Formula__c & ';', '') &
IF(FS_Ops_Only__c == true,Price_book_Code__c & ' ' & 'FS Ops Only' & ' ' & Tier_Formula__c & ';', '') &
IF(PS_Ops_Only__c == true,Price_book_Code__c & ' ' & 'PS Ops Only' & ' ' & Tier_Formula__c & ';', '') &
IF(G_Cloud__c == true,Price_book_Code__c & ' ' & 'G-Cloud' & ' ' & Tier_Formula__c & ';', '') &
IF(FS_Sales__c == true,Price_book_Code__c & ' ' & 'FS Sales' & ' ' & Tier_Formula__c & ';', '') &
IF(PS_Sales__c== true,Price_book_Code__c & ' ' & 'PS Sales' & ' ' & Tier_Formula__c, '')
CustomField.label: OP4I Pricebook Tier
